1.content: It was a normal day out in space-time, and the Strangers and Alains were bored, so they decided to watch events unfold above Mobius and it's temporal opposite, Earth-S. They were watching Sonic and the freedom fighters battle Robotnik when the First Stranger had an obvious idea:"Hey, guys, what if we interfere in their war?" The rest of them agreed: They'd had enough of simply watching the resistance; it was time to act. The Strangers and Alains then gathered their allies and formed a plan with the various demigods. The Fourth Stranger set out to their New Eureka research base in Panem's Far West to check on their progress. Also, to put into mass production and 'field test' their new prototypes on Swatbots during the initial invasion, including the new Praetorian Dreadnoughts from District 19's Afterlife Department.
1.title: The Beginning of the War

11.content: After the meeting, the Strangers went to their private bar/gun room to get intoxicated and prepare to hunt demons. 1-10 went to Supernatural's Hell through their personal Devil's Gate, 11-20 went to the Warp, and 21-30 went to the Eye of Terror to help the Grey Knights Legion. 31-50 stayed behind to manage and watch over the Timefleet and the situation on Mobius. Of course, the leaving Strangers departed in their own Ships for the various fronts, listening to Kansas and Pink Floyd the whole way.
11.title: The Strangers go to various Hells.

choices: Knuckles, paranoid about the Master Emerald
113.title: Jump to Mobius

1132.content: Knuckles was busy sleeping on the Emerald Shrine's steps when a voice spoke in his head:"Knuckles, my faithful and loyal guardian, someone is soon coming to take me away from this world, someone VERY powerful. Let them take me, and go with them. It is very important that you trust them." Knuckles, startled and horrified, then asked the Master Emerald:"Wait, who's coming to take you? And you could've spoken to me THIS WHOLE TIME?!" Then, Knuckles heard a large roaring sound, like that of a METEOR... He turned, and saw a giant fireball streaking towards him and the Emerald, which he immediately tried to shield from the coming blast that NEVER CAME. Instead, the meteor stopped in mid-air and turned towards the ground, then began to descend. When the drop-pod had landed, two figures emerged from the pod:A giant human wearing a kind of golden armor, and a human girl. The two otherworlders walked up the shrine steps, and the Stranger introduced himself:"Hello, Knuckles, good to see you again. You may call me the Stranger, and I'm lead to believe that Mas. Eme. here's brought you up to speed, yeah? I'm guessing he was vague about it, though. Like he said, me and Shine here have come to take you both from here, at least for a little while." Knuckles then warned to the Stranger as the human lifted the Master Emerald:"Alright, since you know the Emerald. Just be careful with it, okay?" The Stranger laughed, then averted his fears:"Relax, Knuckles, I know what I'm doing. Shine, if you could, please?" The human girl whose name was apparently Shine then placed a device where the Master Emerald just sat, then she pulled several cords from it and proceeded to wrap them around the pillars in a spiral pattern. Knuckles, confused and worried, demanded of her:"Hey, just what do you think you're doing?!" He then turned to face the Stranger in anger, who consoled him:"Don't worry; she's just repairing the Shrine with nanotech." At that point, Shine had finished lining the Shrine with cords, and proceeded to activate the device. Knuckles looked at the spectacle before him with joy and amazement as the Shrine was restored to perfect condition, just like he'd seen it in his visions. The four of them then entered the pod, which then rocketed back into space, the pristine Shrine standing resolute and immovable; a testament to the ancients.
1132.title: The Restoration and Revealing.

142.content: "Hey! Hypon! We're going to take out Robotnik, want to come?" yelled the Ninth Stranger as he ran towards him. Hypon answered him:"Sure, I'll help. Me and myself are already aboard, I take it?" The Ninth:"Ha, you know it, my friend. Now, let's go to the Secret Districts, yeah? Got some prototypes we'd love to try out on Robotnik's crapbots."
142.title: A Request

choices: Jump to someone in the Timefleet or on a world
1422.content: "Oh, I forgot something", said the Ninth. "What is it?" asked Hypon. "Alain told me about this group called Team Skull. Apparently, from want he's seen of them, they're real evil." "Hey, I know them!" realized Hypon. "You know them, too?" asked the Ninth. "Well, actually I know a member" admitted Hypon. "Oh, which one?" said the ninth. "His name is Mk." "That's their leader," said the Ninth. "Wow, really?" "Yeah. He's a bit of a badasshole. So, let's go." They go down to Mobius to the Team's base. They were let in without trouble. "So, what brings you here, Hypon." "Oh, we want you and your team to help us take down eggman," said Hypon. The Ninth remarked:"Not that we need your help, but still..." Alright we're in." "Cool," said Hypon. "We also have a lot prototypes we want to test out, and said the Ninth. "Alright guys let's go." "Yes sir," said his team. They then left for the Timefleet.
1422.title: Recruiting Team Skull as test subjects

15221.content: As the Strangers were fighting one another and getting intoxicated, the Alains walked in wiped out. The 128th Stranger asked them:"Hey, Alains, what happened to you guys?" Each of the Alains grabbed a beer case and a rifle, sat down in the couches, and simply said in unison:"We've got a problem." The Strangers laughed, then realized that they weren't joking:"MK somehow beat you guys, and told the freedom fighters that you're not a problem anymore?! Oh, great! Now they think we're after them! DAMN! Well, we'd better get the invasion of Eggman and Robotnik started early, huh? Xaviers, get the Drop-pods ready, we're going to WAR!" The Xaviers then set about preparing the Timefleets for the planetary invasion, and the Kinds gathered themselves for combat, donning power armor and wolfing themselves up.
15221.title: WAAAAAAAAAAGH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

153.content: Meanwhile, Hypon, who was with the Strangers and who was part of Mobius, was talking with them.

choices: Jump to someone or somewhere else?
1531.content: The Strangers saw Hypon enter their Conflict Decision Room, and cheered:"Hey, Hypon! Come in, come in! We just decided to take out Robotnik, want to join in?" Hypon immediately answered:"Sure, I'll join in. Is there going to be an infiltration?" The Seventh Stranger answered Hypon:"Well, considering the robotization en masse and that we already know all the freedom fighters, there'll either not be one or it'll be very short." Hypon guessed as much:"So, sabotage, then? What bombs and rifles will we be using?"
1531.title: Hypon joins the Invasion!

15312.title: Jump to someone or somewhere else?

153122.content: Hypon was leaving the room when the 12th Stranger stopped him:"Oh by the way, Hypon, we've got a spy here, and you might want to stick around." The 13th then walked over to the corner of the room, and grabbed at the air. When his fist found purchase, he closed his fist and lifted up the cloaked Mobian observer, whose cloaking device immediately failed upon being lifted 20 feet in the air. (The rooms and chambers on the Timefleet are actually infinite-stories tall.) The Eleventh Stranger then walked over to the 13th, and yelled in the spy's face, asking:"WHO ARE YOU, MORTAL? AND WHO DO YOU WORK FOR?!" The Mobian was silent, refusing to answer. The Eleventh continued:"I'D SUGGEST YOU COOPERATE, BECAUSE NEARLY ANYONE IN THIS ROOM COULD EASILY KILL YOU WITH A THOUGHT!" The Mobian revealed horror on his face, then quickly cooperated:"Alright, alright! Just don't kill me! My name is _____, and I'm spying on you for _____, okay?!"
153122.title: A Stupid Attempt at Hiding

1531221.content: Caleb: I worked by myself for 10 years straight til now that is. Sorry but I can't stick around. *turns to Hypon.* See you later, brother. Chaos Stop. Before I go, Sonic has a brother and a sister. If you want to learn more about me, ask Hypon. *Takes the recording and telaports to the freedom fighters base.*
1531221.title: Caleb, Freedom fighters

15312211.content: The Eleventh, Twelth, and Thirteenth moved to stop his teleportation, but the Fourteenth stopped them:"No, guys, let him go." He turned to Hypon:"By the way, Hypon, we already know about the Royal Family. Now, then, let's go talk to the leaders of the Resistance and offer our support, shall we?" The Strangers, Alains, and Hypon then left the Conflict Decision Room to reconvene in a week at the Planetary Communication Chamber.
15312211.title: The Strangers reveal who they'll side with

"Yes, it was," said Alain. He continued:"By the way, M.K., you're IN a former drug cabinet, it's just a million times smaller. LITERALLY."

15411211221221122121.title: with mk

154112112212211221211.content:
Then, gigantic armies of warriors from infinite species dropped, beamed, and teleported into and around each of MK's heavily defended cities, which were soon annihilated from orbit after the defending forces were eaten alive by the unleashed UltraZerg. Then, the Strangers, Alains, and Xaviers resurrected the freedom fighters, immortalized them, and gave each and every one of them their own Timefleet. Finally, the Forces of Reality descended upon MK's capital, conquered it entirely within 5 minutes, and threw the Hellbringers into the Warp.

And so, the planet of Mobius rose to become the center of the just and mighty Mobian Imperium.
154112112212211221211.title: The End is Nigh!

info.brief_description: A Sonic the Hedgehog fanfic, with some new people
info.description: Something I thought of while watching Sonic the Hedgehog. Has the same rules as my Fall of Panem story.
